Name: 狼人杀单机版
About the game: This is a game of character reasoning, the stand-alone version of Werewolf Suitable for single leisure. 5 kinds of identities can be selected, 20 avatars can be obtained, and 5 3 achievements can be achieved. The game is divided into two camps. The Human camp has: Seer, Guard, and four Civilians. The Mutant camp has: Werewolf, Vampire. Infer the role of everyone through the behavior of other players By action and voting, Trying to reduce the numbers of other camp. The surviving camp victory.
